summary: An ordinance relating to and specifying and adopting a plan or system of additions and betterments to and extensions of, the existing municipal waterworks system; providing for the construction and acquisition of an aqueduct, tunnel, certain pipe lines, reservoirs, mains and other plant facilities and equipment, for the acquisition of certain pipe line rights-of-way, and for the removal of surface soil from the shores of Lake Youngs; declaring the estimated cost thereof, as near as may be; providing for the issuance and sale of bonds to provide funds therefor; etc.
